sections.heading: Director:
sections.text:
Authorization to investigate and control pests, plant diseases and disorders,

and noxious weeds; establishment of program to certify agricultural products as

being free from noxious weeds and propagative parts.

sections.heading: Director:
sections.text: Cooperation for suppression of vertebrate pests.

sections.heading: Account
sections.text:
for the Control of Weeds; creation; use of money in Account; acceptance of

gifts and grants.

sections.heading: Department
sections.text: to conduct inspections; notice to control pest, noxious weed or plant disease.

sections.heading: Premises
sections.text:
infested with pest, noxious weed or plant disease declared to be public

nuisance; abatement by Department.

sections.heading: Expenses
sections.text:
for abatement of nuisance become lien against property; notice of lien; action

to foreclose lien; sales.

sections.heading: Regulation
sections.text:
of host plants in infested areas: Hearing; notice; order; enforcement; civil

penalty.

sections.heading: Declaration
sections.text: of noxious weeds; temporary designation; limitations.

sections.heading: General
sections.text:
powers and duties of State Quarantine Officer; use of funds received for

purpose of control of noxious weeds.

sections.heading: Control
sections.text: of noxious weeds by owner or occupant of land.

sections.heading: State
sections.text:
Quarantine Officer to investigate noxious weeds; notice to owner or occupant of

land where noxious weeds are found.

sections.heading: Neglect
sections.text:
of owner or occupant to control weeds after notice; action by county

commissioners; payment of costs by county.

sections.heading: County
sections.text:
treasurer to mail itemized statement of costs to control weeds to owner or

occupant; objections and hearing; costs constitute lien on land.

sections.heading: Incorporated
sections.text:
city to pay county for any expense incurred by county to control noxious weeds

within city.

sections.heading: Control
sections.text: of noxious weeds from public domain; reimbursement by Federal Government.

sections.heading: Creation
sections.text:
of district: Initiation by board of county commissioners or petition; hearing;

exclusion of land; addition of power to control noxious weeds.

sections.heading: Board
sections.text: of directors: Appointment; number; qualifications; terms; vacancies.

sections.heading: Board
sections.text:
of directors: Alternative membership if district includes conservation

district; agreement for supervisors of conservation district to serve ex

officio; termination of agreement; expenditure of money.

sections.heading: Review
sections.text:
of action of board of county commissioners or board of directors by State Board

of Agriculture; notice and hearing; judicial review; authorization for

landowner to seek removal of member of board of directors.

sections.heading: Performance
sections.text:
of necessary work by weed control officer on failure by landowner; charges as

lien.

sections.heading: Assessments
sections.text:
of real property in district; medium-term obligations; reconsideration of levy

of assessment after creation of district; hearing to consider exclusions of

land from district required under certain circumstances.

sections.heading: Change
sections.text:
of boundaries: Petition; notice and hearing; resolution; ratification by board

of county commissioners.

sections.heading: License
sections.text:
required to produce, hold, distribute, collect or sell nursery stock;

exceptions; waivers.

sections.heading: Application
sections.text: for license; transfer of license prohibited; display of license.

sections.heading: Revocation
sections.text: or suspension of or refusal to issue or renew license; notice and hearing.

sections.heading: Inspection
sections.text: of businesses, invoices and applicable certificates.

sections.heading: Certification
sections.text: of pest conditions or quality of nursery stock for shipment; fees.

sections.heading: Certificates
sections.text:
required for shipments of nursery stock; carrier prohibited from delivering

nursery stock without appropriate certificate; exemption.

sections.heading: Labeling
sections.text: of containers of nursery stock; bulk shipments.

sections.heading: Infected
sections.text: or infested nursery stock: Shipment from State; destruction; treatment.

sections.heading: Enforcement
sections.text:
by Director: Administrative fine; order to correct violation; request for

action by district attorney; regulations.

sections.heading: Policy
sections.text: of this State; purpose of provisions.

sections.heading: Exemption
sections.text: from certain provisions for farmer-owners and gardeners.

sections.heading: Temporary
sections.text: exemption from licensure for applicator trainee: Regulations.

sections.heading: License
License
sections.text:
as applicator required for natural person to engage in certain activities

concerning control of wood-destroying pests or organisms; exception.

sections.heading: Application
sections.text:
for business license or license as applicator. [Effective until the date of the

repeal of 42 U.S.C. � 666, the federal law requiring each state to establish

procedures for withholding, suspending and restricting the professional,

occupational and recreational licenses for child support arrearages and for

noncompliance with certain processes relating to paternity or child support

proceedings.]

sections.heading: Examination
sections.text: and qualifications of applicant for license as applicator or business license.

sections.heading: Petition
sections.text: to review criminal history to obtain license; requirements; fee; report.

sections.heading: Issuance,
sections.text:
expiration and renewal of business license or license as applicator. [Effective

until the date of the repeal of 42 U.S.C. � 666, the federal law requiring each

state to establish procedures for withholding, suspending and restricting the

professional, occupational and recreational licenses for child support

arrearages and for noncompliance with certain processes relating to paternity

or child support proceedings.]

sections.heading: Application
sections.text:
for renewal of license required to include information relating to state

business license; grounds for denial of renewal.

sections.heading: Application
sections.text:
for license: Statement by applicant concerning payment of child support;

grounds for denial; duty of Director. [Effective until the date of the repeal

of 42 U.S.C. � 666, the federal law requiring each state to establish

procedures for withholding, suspending and restricting the professional,

occupational and recreational licenses for child support arrearages and for

noncompliance with certain processes relating to paternity or child support

proceedings.]

sections.heading: Proof
sections.text:
of insurance required of applicant for business license; actions by injured

persons; limitation of actions; investigations by Director.

sections.heading: Refusal
sections.text:
to issue license as applicator; submission of fingerprints or other information

for background check of applicant; fees.

sections.heading: Suspension,
sections.text:
revocation or modification of business license or license issued to applicator;

background check required when disciplinary action initiated.

sections.heading: Suspension
sections.text:
of license for failure to pay child support or comply with certain subpoenas or

warrants; reinstatement of license. [Effective until the date of the repeal of

42 U.S.C. � 666, the federal law requiring each state to establish procedures

for withholding, suspending and restricting the professional, occupational and

recreational licenses for child support arrearages and for noncompliance with

certain processes relating to paternity or child support proceedings.]

sections.text: pesticides: Denial, suspension, revocation or modification of certificate.

sections.text: of Director: Materials and methods for application.

sections.text: of Director: Records and reports of licensees and other applicators.

sections.text:
of information regarding injuries from improper application and prevention of

sections.text: of Director and inspectors to enter and inspect public or private premises.

sections.text:
by Director: Administrative fine; order to correct violation; request for

sections.text: of district: Petition; notice and hearing; exclusion of land.
